verses.text: But now thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* that \w created|strong="H1254"\w* thee, O \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, and he that \w formed|strong="H3335"\w* thee, O \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w Fear|strong="H3372"\w* not: for I have \w redeemed|strong="H1350"\w* thee, I have \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \add thee\add* by thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w*; thou \add art\add* mine.

When thou passest \w through|strong="H5674"\w* the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*, I \add will be\add* with thee; and through the \w rivers|strong="H5104"\w*, they shall not \w overflow|strong="H7857"\w* thee: when thou \w walkest|strong="H3212"\w* \w through|strong="H1119"\w* the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, thou shalt not be \w burned|strong="H3554"\w*; neither shall the \w flame|strong="H3852"\w* \w kindle|strong="H1197"\w* upon thee.

For I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, the Holy \w One|strong="H6918"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, thy \w Saviour|strong="H3467"\w*: I \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \add for\add* thy \w ransom|strong="H3724"\w*, \w Ethiopia|strong="H3568"\w* and \w Seba|strong="H5434"\w* for thee.

Since thou wast \w precious|strong="H3365"\w* in my \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*, thou hast been \w honourable|strong="H3513"\w*, and I have \w loved|strong="H0157"\w* thee: therefore will I \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w men|strong="H0120"\w* for thee, and \w people|strong="H3816"\w* for thy \w life|strong="H5315"\w*.\f + \fr 43.4 \ft life: or, person\f*

\w Fear|strong="H3372"\w* not: for I \add am\add* with thee: I will \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* thy \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* from the \w east|strong="H4217"\w*, and \w gather|strong="H6908"\w* thee from the \w west|strong="H4628"\w*;

I will \w say|strong="H0559"\w* to the \w north|strong="H6828"\w*, Give \w up|strong="H5414"\w*; and to the \w south|strong="H8486"\w*, Keep not \w back|strong="H3607"\w*: \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* my \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* from \w far|strong="H7350"\w*, and my \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* from the \w ends|strong="H7097"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*;

\add Even\add* every \w one|strong="H3605"\w* that is \w called|strong="H7121"\w* by my \w name|strong="H8034"\w*: for I have \w created|strong="H1254"\w* him for my \w glory|strong="H3519"\w*, I have \w formed|strong="H3335"\w* him; yea, I have \w made|strong="H6213"\w* him.

¶ Bring \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* the \w blind|strong="H5787"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \w have|strong="H3426"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, and the \w deaf|strong="H2795"\w* that have \w ears|strong="H0241"\w*.

Let all the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* be \w gathered|strong="H6908"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*, and let the \w people|strong="H3816"\w* be \w assembled|strong="H0622"\w*: who among them can \w declare|strong="H5046"\w* this, and \w shew|strong="H8085"\w* us former \w things|strong="H7223"\w*? let them bring \w forth|strong="H5414"\w* their \w witnesses|strong="H5707"\w*, that they may be \w justified|strong="H6663"\w*: or let them \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \add It is\add* \w truth|strong="H0571"\w*.

Ye \add are\add* my \w witnesses|strong="H5707"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and my \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* whom I have \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w*: that ye may \w know|strong="H3045"\w* and \w believe|strong="H0539"\w* me, and \w understand|strong="H0995"\w* that I \add am\add* he: \w before|strong="H6440"\w* me there was no \w God|strong="H0410"\w* \w formed|strong="H3335"\w*, neither shall there be \w after|strong="H0310"\w* me.\f + \fr 43.10 \ft no…: or, nothing formed of God\f*
I, \add even\add* I, \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; and \w beside|strong="H1107"\w* me \add there is\add* no \w saviour|strong="H3467"\w*.

I have \w declared|strong="H5046"\w*, and have \w saved|strong="H3467"\w*, and I have \w shewed|strong="H8085"\w*, when \add there was\add* no \w strange|strong="H2114"\w* \add god\add* among you: therefore ye \add are\add* my \w witnesses|strong="H5707"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, that I \add am\add* \w God|strong="H0410"\w*.

Yea, before the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \add was\add* I \add am\add* he; and \add there is\add* none that can \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* out of my \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*: I will \w work|strong="H6466"\w*, and who shall \w let|strong="H7725"\w* it?\f + \fr 43.13 \ft let it: Heb. turn it back?\f*

¶ Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, your \w redeemer|strong="H1350"\w*, the Holy \w One|strong="H6918"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; For your sake I have \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* to \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, and have brought \w down|strong="H3381"\w* all their \w nobles|strong="H1281"\w*, and the \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w*, whose \w cry|strong="H7440"\w* \add is\add* in the \w ships|strong="H0591"\w*.\f + \fr 43.14 \ft nobles: Heb. bars\f*
I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, your Holy \w One|strong="H6918"\w*, the \w creator|strong="H1254"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, your \w King|strong="H4428"\w*.

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, which \w maketh|strong="H5414"\w* a \w way|strong="H1870"\w* in the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, and a \w path|strong="H5410"\w* in the \w mighty|strong="H5794"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*;

Which bringeth \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* the \w chariot|strong="H7393"\w* and \w horse|strong="H5483"\w*, the \w army|strong="H2428"\w* and the \w power|strong="H5808"\w*; they shall lie \w down|strong="H7901"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*, they shall not \w rise|strong="H6965"\w*: they are \w extinct|strong="H1846"\w*, they are \w quenched|strong="H3518"\w* as \w tow|strong="H6594"\w*.
¶ \w Remember|strong="H2142"\w* ye not the former \w things|strong="H7223"\w*, neither \w consider|strong="H0995"\w* the things of \w old|strong="H6931"\w*.

Behold, I will \w do|strong="H6213"\w* a new \w thing|strong="H2319"\w*; now it shall spring \w forth|strong="H6779"\w*; shall ye not \w know|strong="H3045"\w* it? I will even \w make|strong="H7760"\w* a \w way|strong="H1870"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, \add and\add* \w rivers|strong="H5104"\w* in the \w desert|strong="H3452"\w*.

The \w beast|strong="H2416"\w* of the \w field|strong="H7704"\w* shall \w honour|strong="H3513"\w* me, the \w dragons|strong="H8577"\w* and the \w owls|strong="H1323"\w*: because I \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, \add and\add* \w rivers|strong="H5104"\w* in the \w desert|strong="H3452"\w*, to give \w drink|strong="H8248"\w* to my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, my \w chosen|strong="H0972"\w*.\f + \fr 43.20 \ft owls: or, ostriches: Heb. daughters of the owl\f*
\w This|strong="H2098"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* have I \w formed|strong="H3335"\w* for myself; they shall shew \w forth|strong="H5608"\w* my \w praise|strong="H8416"\w*.
¶ But thou hast not \w called|strong="H7121"\w* upon me, O \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*; but thou hast been \w weary|strong="H3021"\w* of me, O \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

Thou hast not \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* me the small \w cattle|strong="H7716"\w* of thy burnt \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w*; neither hast thou \w honoured|strong="H3513"\w* me with thy \w sacrifices|strong="H2077"\w*. I have not caused thee to \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* with an \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*, nor \w wearied|strong="H3021"\w* thee with \w incense|strong="H3828"\w*.\f + \fr 43.23 \ft small…: Heb. lambs, or, kids\f*

Thou hast \w bought|strong="H7069"\w* me no sweet \w cane|strong="H7070"\w* with \w money|strong="H3701"\w*, neither hast thou \w filled|strong="H7301"\w* me with the \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* of thy \w sacrifices|strong="H2077"\w*: but thou hast made me to \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* with thy \w sins|strong="H2403"\w*, thou hast \w wearied|strong="H3021"\w* me with thine \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w*.\f + \fr 43.24 \ft filled…: Heb. made me drunk, or, abundantly moistened\f*

I, \add even\add* I, \add am\add* he that blotteth \w out|strong="H4229"\w* thy \w transgressions|strong="H6588"\w* for mine own sake, and will not \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* thy \w sins|strong="H2403"\w*.
Put me in \w remembrance|strong="H2142"\w*: let us \w plead|strong="H8199"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*: \w declare|strong="H5608"\w* thou, that thou mayest be \w justified|strong="H6663"\w*.

Thy \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w* hath \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w*, and thy \w teachers|strong="H3887"\w* have \w transgressed|strong="H6586"\w* against me.\f + \fr 43.27 \ft teachers: Heb. interpreters\f*

Therefore I have \w profaned|strong="H2490"\w* the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w*, and have \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* to the \w curse|strong="H2764"\w*, and \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* to \w reproaches|strong="H1421"\w*.\f + \fr 43.28 \ft princes…: or, holy princes\f*
